Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
621 17th Street is a 391,667 square foot office building in Denvers Central Business district.  The property is situated in central downtown Denver and ideally positioned at the 18th and California light rail station.  The project is easily accessible from all of Denver and offers tenants direct access to nearby amenities including the 16th Street mall and the Denver Pavilions.  

621 17th Street offers a full-service experience to its tenants and visitors from the moment one arrives at the building.  The on-site amenities include an ink! Caf, bank, attached covered parking garage, concierge, 24/7 security, onsite property management, conference center and a free fitness center.
